TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UpdateStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the action to take with regard to the current and remaining rows during an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.UpdateStatus Continue = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter"> is to continue proccessing rows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.UpdateStatus ErrorsOccurred = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The event handler reports that the update should be treated as an error.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.UpdateStatus SkipAllRemainingRows = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The current row and all remaining rows are not to be updated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.UpdateStatus SkipCurrentRow = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The current row is not to be updated.
